verses.verse: And he <S%G756>began<s%> to <S%G3004>speak<s%> to them by <S%G3850>parables.<s%> A certain <S%G444>man<s%> <S%G5452>planted<s%> a <S%G290>vineyard,<s%> and <S%G4060>set<s%> an <S%G5418>hedge<s%> about <S%G5418><s%> it, and dig <S%G3736><s%> a place for the <S%G5276>winefat,<s%> and <S%G3618>built<s%> a <S%G4444>tower,<s%> and <S%G1554>let<s%> it out to <S%G1092>farmers,<s%> and <S%G589>went<s%> into a far country. <S%G589><s%>

And at the <S%G2540>season<s%> he <S%G649>sent<s%> to the <S%G1092>farmers<s%> a <S%G1401>servant,<s%> that he might <S%G2983>receive<s%> from the <S%G1092>farmers<s%> of the <S%G2590>fruit<s%> of the vineyard. <S%G290><s%>
And they caught <S%G2983><s%> him, and <S%G1194>beat<s%> him, and sent <S%G649><s%> him <S%G649>away<s%> empty. <S%G2756><s%>

And <S%G3825>again<s%> he <S%G649>sent<s%> to them <S%G243>another<s%> <S%G1401>servant;<s%> and at him they <S%G3036>cast<s%> <S%G3036>stones,<s%> and wounded him in the <S%G2775>head,<s%> and sent <S%G649><s%> him <S%G649>away<s%> <S%G821>shamefully<s%> handled. <S%G821><s%>

And <S%G3825>again<s%> he <S%G649>sent<s%> <S%G243>another;<s%> and him they <S%G615>killed,<s%> and <S%G4183>many<s%> <S%G243>others;<s%> <S%G1194>beating<s%> some, <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3303><s%> and <S%G615>killing<s%> some. <S%G3588><s%>

<S%G2192>Having<s%> <S%G2089>yet<s%> <S%G3767>therefore<s%> <S%G1520>one<s%> <S%G5207>son,<s%> his well <S%G27>beloved,<s%> he <S%G649>sent<s%> him <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G2078>last<s%> to them, <S%G3004>saying,<s%> They will <S%G1788>reverence<s%> my son. <S%G5207><s%>

But <S%G1565>those<s%> <S%G1092>farmers<s%> <S%G2036>said<s%> <S%G4314>among<s%> <S%G1438>themselves,<s%> <S%G3778>This<s%> is the <S%G2818>heir;<s%> <S%G1205>come,<s%> let us <S%G615>kill<s%> him, and the <S%G2817>inheritance<s%> shall be our's. <S%G2257><s%>
And they <S%G2983>took<s%> him, and killed <S%G615><s%> him, and cast <S%G1544><s%> him out of the vineyard. <S%G290><s%>

<S%G5101>What<s%> shall <S%G3767>therefore<s%> the <S%G2962>lord<s%> of the <S%G290>vineyard<s%> <S%G4160>do?<s%> he will <S%G2064>come<s%> and <S%G622>destroy<s%> the <S%G1092>farmers,<s%> and will <S%G1325>give<s%> the <S%G290>vineyard<s%> to others. <S%G243><s%>

And have you not <S%G314>read<s%> <S%G5026>this<s%> <S%G1124>scripture;<s%> The <S%G3037>stone<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> the <S%G3618>builders<s%> <S%G593>rejected<s%> is become <S%G1096><s%> <S%G1519><s%> the <S%G2776>head<s%> of the corner: <S%G1137><s%>
<S%G3778>This<s%> was the <S%G2962>Lord's<s%> <S%G1096>doing,<s%> and it is <S%G2298>marvelous<s%> in our eyes? <S%G3788><s%>

And they <S%G2212>sought<s%> to lay <S%G2902>hold<s%> on him, but <S%G5399>feared<s%> the <S%G3793>people:<s%> for they <S%G1097>knew<s%> that he had <S%G2036>spoken<s%> the <S%G3850>parable<s%> <S%G4314>against<s%> them: and they <S%G863>left<s%> him, and <S%G565>went<s%> their way.
And they <S%G649>send<s%> to him <S%G5100>certain<s%> of the <S%G5330>Pharisees<s%> and of the <S%G2265>Herodians,<s%> to <S%G64>catch<s%> him in his <S%G3056>words.<s%>

And when they were <S%G2064>come,<s%> they <S%G3004>say<s%> to him, <S%G1320>Master,<s%> we <S%G1492>know<s%> that you <S%G1488>are<s%> <S%G227>true,<s%> and <S%G3199>care<s%> for <S%G3762>no<s%> <S%G444>man:<s%> for you <S%G991>regard<s%> not the <S%G4383>person<s%> of <S%G444>men,<s%> but <S%G1321>teach<s%> the <S%G3598>way<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> in <S%G225>truth:<s%> Is it <S%G1832>lawful<s%> to <S%G1325>give<s%> <S%G2778>tribute<s%> to <S%G2541>Caesar,<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> not?

Shall we <S%G1325>give,<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> shall we not <S%G1325>give?<s%> But he, <S%G1492>knowing<s%> their <S%G5272>hypocrisy,<s%> <S%G2036>said<s%> to them, <S%G5101>Why<s%> <S%G3985>tempt<s%> you me? <S%G5342>bring<s%> me a <S%G1220>penny,<s%> that I may see <S%G1492><s%> it.

And they <S%G5342>brought<s%> it. And he <S%G3004>said<s%> to them, Whose <S%G5101><s%> is <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G1504>image<s%> and superscription? <S%G1923><s%> And they <S%G2036>said<s%> to him, <S%G2541>Caesar's.<s%>

And <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G611>answering<s%> <S%G2036>said<s%> to them, <S%G591>Render<s%> to <S%G2541>Caesar<s%> the things that are <S%G2541>Caesar's,<s%> and to <S%G2316>God<s%> the things that are God's. <S%G2316><s%> And they <S%G2296>marveled<s%> <S%G1909>at<s%> him.

<S%G2532>Then<s%> <S%G2064>come<s%> to him the <S%G4523>Sadducees,<s%> <S%G3748>which<s%> <S%G3004>say<s%> there is <S%G3361>no<s%> <S%G386>resurrection;<s%> and they <S%G1905>asked<s%> him, <S%G3004>saying,<s%>

<S%G1320>Master,<s%> <S%G3475>Moses<s%> <S%G1125>wrote<s%> to us, <S%G1437>If<s%> a <S%G5100>man's<s%> <S%G80>brother<s%> <S%G599>die,<s%> and <S%G2641>leave<s%> his <S%G1135>wife<s%> <S%G2641>behind<s%> him, and <S%G863>leave<s%> <S%G3361>no<s%> <S%G5043>children,<s%> that his <S%G80>brother<s%> should <S%G2983>take<s%> his <S%G1135>wife,<s%> and <S%G1817>raise<s%> up <S%G4690>seed<s%> to his <S%G80>brother.<s%>

<S%G3767>Now<s%> there were <S%G2033>seven<s%> <S%G80>brothers:<s%> and the <S%G4413>first<s%> <S%G2983>took<s%> a <S%G1135>wife,<s%> and <S%G599>dying<s%> <S%G863>left<s%> <S%G3756>no<s%> <S%G4690>seed.<s%>
And the <S%G1208>second<s%> <S%G2983>took<s%> her, and <S%G599>died,<s%> <S%G3761>neither<s%> <S%G863>left<s%> he any <S%G4690>seed:<s%> and the <S%G5154>third<s%> <S%G5615>likewise.<s%>

And the <S%G2033>seven<s%> <S%G2983>had<s%> her, and <S%G863>left<s%> <S%G3756>no<s%> <S%G4690>seed:<s%> <S%G2078>last<s%> of <S%G3956>all<s%> the <S%G1135>woman<s%> <S%G599>died<s%> <S%G2532>also.<s%>

In the <S%G386>resurrection<s%> <S%G3767>therefore,<s%> <S%G3752>when<s%> they shall <S%G450>rise,<s%> <S%G5101>whose<s%> <S%G1135>wife<s%> shall she be of them? for the <S%G2033>seven<s%> <S%G2192>had<s%> her to <S%G1135>wife.<s%>

And <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G611>answering<s%> <S%G2036>said<s%> to them, Do you not therefore <S%G1223><s%> <S%G5124><s%> <S%G4105>err,<s%> because you <S%G1492>know<s%> not the <S%G1124>scriptures,<s%> <S%G3366>neither<s%> the <S%G1411>power<s%> of God? <S%G2316><s%>

For <S%G3752>when<s%> they shall <S%G450>rise<s%> from the <S%G3498>dead,<s%> they <S%G3777>neither<s%> <S%G1060>marry,<s%> <S%G3777>nor<s%> are given in <S%G1061>marriage;<s%> but are as the <S%G32>angels<s%> <S%G3588>which<s%> are in heaven. <S%G3772><s%>

And as <S%G4012>touching<s%> the <S%G3498>dead,<s%> that they <S%G1453>rise:<s%> have you not <S%G314>read<s%> in the <S%G976>book<s%> of <S%G3475>Moses,<s%> <S%G5613>how<s%> in the <S%G942>bush<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G2036>spoke<s%> to him, <S%G3004>saying,<s%> I am the <S%G2316>God<s%> of <S%G11>Abraham,<s%> and the <S%G2316>God<s%> of <S%G2464>Isaac,<s%> and the <S%G2316>God<s%> of Jacob? <S%G2384><s%>
He is not the <S%G2316>God<s%> of the <S%G3498>dead,<s%> but the <S%G2316>God<s%> of the <S%G2198>living:<s%> you <S%G3767>therefore<s%> do <S%G4183>greatly<s%> err. <S%G4105><s%>

And <S%G1520>one<s%> of the <S%G1122>scribes<s%> <S%G4334>came,<s%> and having <S%G191>heard<s%> them <S%G4802>reasoning<s%> <S%G4802>together,<s%> and <S%G1492>perceiving<s%> that he had <S%G611>answered<s%> them <S%G2573>well,<s%> <S%G1905>asked<s%> him, <S%G4169>Which<s%> is the <S%G4413>first<s%> <S%G1785>commandment<s%> of <S%G3956>all?<s%>

And <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G611>answered<s%> him, The <S%G4413>first<s%> of <S%G3956>all<s%> the commandments <S%G1785><s%> is, <S%G191>Hear,<s%> O <S%G2474>Israel;<s%> The <S%G2962>Lord<s%> our <S%G2316>God<s%> is <S%G1520>one<s%> Lord: <S%G2962><s%>

And you shall <S%G25>love<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> your <S%G2316>God<s%> with <S%G3650>all<s%> your <S%G2588>heart,<s%> and with <S%G3650>all<s%> your <S%G5590>soul,<s%> and with <S%G3650>all<s%> your <S%G1271>mind,<s%> and with <S%G3650>all<s%> your <S%G2479>strength:<s%> this <S%G3778><s%> is the <S%G4413>first<s%> commandment. <S%G1785><s%>

And the second <S%G1208><s%> is like, <S%G3664><s%> namely <S%G3778>this,<s%> You shall <S%G25>love<s%> your <S%G4139>neighbor<s%> as <S%G4572>yourself.<s%> There is <S%G3756>none<s%> <S%G243>other<s%> <S%G1785>commandment<s%> <S%G3187>greater<s%> than these. <S%G5130><s%>

And the <S%G1122>scribe<s%> <S%G2036>said<s%> to him, <S%G2573>Well,<s%> <S%G1320>Master,<s%> you have <S%G2036>said<s%> the <S%G225>truth:<s%> for there is <S%G1520>one<s%> <S%G2316>God;<s%> and there is <S%G3756>none<s%> <S%G243>other<s%> but he:

And to <S%G25>love<s%> him with <S%G3650>all<s%> the <S%G2588>heart,<s%> and with <S%G3650>all<s%> the <S%G4907>understanding,<s%> and with <S%G3650>all<s%> the <S%G5590>soul,<s%> and with <S%G3650>all<s%> the <S%G2479>strength,<s%> and to <S%G25>love<s%> his <S%G4139>neighbor<s%> as <S%G1438>himself,<s%> is <S%G4119>more<s%> than <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G3646>whole<s%> <S%G3646>burnt<s%> <S%G3646>offerings<s%> and <S%G2378>sacrifices.<s%>

And when <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G1492>saw<s%> that he <S%G611>answered<s%> <S%G3562>discreetly,<s%> he <S%G2036>said<s%> to him, You <S%G1488>are<s%> not <S%G3112>far<s%> from the <S%G932>kingdom<s%> of God. <S%G2316><s%> And <S%G3762>no<s%> <S%G3762>man<s%> <S%G3765>after<s%> that <S%G5111>dared<s%> <S%G1905>ask<s%> him any question.

And <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G611>answered<s%> and <S%G3004>said,<s%> while he <S%G2258>taught<s%> <S%G1321><s%> in the <S%G2411>temple,<s%> <S%G4459>How<s%> <S%G3004>say<s%> the <S%G1122>scribes<s%> that <S%G5547>Christ<s%> is the <S%G5207>son<s%> of David? <S%G1138><s%>

For <S%G1138>David<s%> <S%G846>himself<s%> <S%G2036>said<s%> by the <S%G40>Holy<s%> <S%G4151>Ghost,<s%> The <S%G2962>LORD<s%> <S%G2036>said<s%> to my <S%G2962>Lord,<s%> <S%G2521>Sit<s%> you <S%G1537>on<s%> my <S%G1188>right<s%> hand, <S%G2193>till<s%> I <S%G5087>make<s%> <S%G4675>your<s%> <S%G2190>enemies<s%> your footstool. <S%G5286><s%>

<S%G1138>David<s%> <S%G3767>therefore<s%> <S%G846>himself<s%> <S%G3004>calls<s%> him <S%G2962>Lord;<s%> and from <S%G4159>where<s%> is he then his son? <S%G5207><s%> And the <S%G4183>common<s%> <S%G3793>people<s%> <S%G191>heard<s%> him <S%G2234>gladly.<s%>

And he <S%G3004>said<s%> to them in his <S%G1322>doctrine,<s%> <S%G991>Beware<s%> of the <S%G1122>scribes,<s%> <S%G3588>which<s%> <S%G2309>love<s%> to <S%G4043>go<s%> in long <S%G4749>clothing,<s%> and love <S%G783>salutations<s%> in the marketplaces, <S%G58><s%>
And the <S%G4410>chief<s%> <S%G4410>seats<s%> in the <S%G4864>synagogues,<s%> and the <S%G4411>uppermost<s%> <S%G4411>rooms<s%> <S%G1722>at<s%> feasts: <S%G1173><s%>

<S%G3739>Which<s%> <S%G2719>devour<s%> <S%G5503>widows'<s%> <S%G3614>houses,<s%> and for a <S%G4392>pretense<s%> <S%G4336>make<s%> <S%G3117>long<s%> <S%G4336>prayers:<s%> <S%G3778>these<s%> shall <S%G2983>receive<s%> <S%G4055>greater<s%> damnation. <S%G2917><s%>

And <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G2523>sat<s%> <S%G2713>over<s%> <S%G2713>against<s%> the <S%G1049>treasury,<s%> and <S%G2334>beheld<s%> <S%G4459>how<s%> the <S%G3793>people<s%> <S%G906>cast<s%> <S%G5475>money<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G1049>treasury:<s%> and <S%G4183>many<s%> that were <S%G4145>rich<s%> <S%G906>cast<s%> in <S%G4183>much.<s%>

And there <S%G2064>came<s%> a <S%G1520>certain<s%> <S%G4434>poor<s%> <S%G5503>widow,<s%> and she <S%G906>threw<s%> in <S%G1417>two<s%> <S%G3016>mites,<s%> <S%G2076>which<s%> <S%G1510>make<s%> a <S%G2835>farthing.<s%>

And he <S%G4341>called<s%> to him his <S%G3101>disciples,<s%> and <S%G3004>said<s%> to them, <S%G281>Truly<s%> I <S%G3004>say<s%> to you, That <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G4434>poor<s%> <S%G5503>widow<s%> has <S%G906>cast<s%> <S%G4119>more<s%> in, than <S%G3956>all<s%> they which have <S%G906>cast<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> the treasury: <S%G1049><s%>

For all <S%G3956><s%> they did <S%G906>cast<s%> in of their <S%G4052>abundance;<s%> but she of her <S%G5304>want<s%> did <S%G906>cast<s%> in <S%G3956>all<s%> that she had, <S%G2192><s%> even <S%G3650>all<s%> her living. <S%G979><s%>
